buyanova.specification

Interface Specification

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SqlSpecification
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FindBetById, FindBetsByUserId, FindHorsesPerformingInRace, FindOddsById, FindOddsByRace, FindRacesByDateRange, FindUserById, FindUserByLogin, FindUserByLoginAndPassword, FindUsersWhoseBetsWonInRace

    public interface Specification
    Interface to mark classes used to specify criteria for queries in Repository implementations.
    See Also:
    Repository.query(Specification), SqlSpecification
